concept.title: Keyed-hash MAC (HMAC)
concept.shortdesc: The Keyed-Hash Message Authentication Code (HMAC) standard (FIPS PUB 198-1) describes a mechanism for message authentication using cryptographic hash functions.

conbody.p: HMAC can be used with a hash function in combination with a shared secret key.
